TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler(object sender, AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type AutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AutomationPropertyChangedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The object that raised the event.

summary.span: 表示由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序实现的方法，该方法处理在属性更改后由 UI 自动化提供程序引发的事件。

span.span: Represents the method implemented by the UI Automation client application to handle the event raised by a UI Automation provider when a property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 表示的 `sender` 可能没有任何缓存的属性或模式，具体取决于应用程序是否在处于活动状态时订阅了此事件 。The represented by `sender` might not have any cached properties or patterns, depending on whether the application subscribed to this event while a was active. 根据提供程序的实现，属性更改事件不一定表示属性值不同;它可能只是表示已将属性设置为相同的值。Depending on the provider implementation, a property-changed event does not necessarily signify that the property value is different; it might just mean that the property was set, even to the same value. 如果你的应用程序只需要响应实际更改，则你负责跟踪属性的状态。If your application needs to respond only to actual changes, it is your responsibility to track the state of the property. ## Examples 在下面的示例中， 处理已订阅元素的属性中的更改。In the following example, changes in the property of subscribed elements are handled. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#172](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/PropertySnips.cs#172)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#172](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/PropertySnips.vb#172)]

related.span: 订阅 UI 自动化事件
